languages.text: "Мое почтение, {name}. Слава о ваших... достижениях в тенях целого сектора мне, разумеется, известна. Ваша предприимчивость и, простите за просторечный термин, живучесть выше всяких похвал. Словно сама судьба помогла вам оказаться здесь". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мое почтение, {name}. Слава о ваших... достижениях в тенях целого сектора мне, разумеется, известна. Ваша предприимчивость и, простите за просторечный термин, живучесть выше всяких похвал. Словно сама судьба помогла вам оказаться здесь". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

languages.text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, {name}. Слава о ваших... достижениях в тенях целого сектора мне, разумеется, известна. Ваша предприимчивость и, простите за просторечный термин, живучесть выше всяких похвал. Словно сама судьба помогла вам оказаться здесь". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if destiny itself assisted you on your way here." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly — either at you or to himself.{/n}

"My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if destiny itself assisted you on your way here." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly — either at you or to himself.{/n}

It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

"My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: “向您致意，{name}。自然，您的恶行……与成就，在整个星区都赫赫有名，我对此并不陌生。不过，请原谅我的直言不讳——您的进取精神与对死亡的抗争非常值得敬佩，感觉就仿佛是命运的翅膀亲自将您送到了这艘船上一样。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，{name}。自然，您的恶行……与成就，在整个星区都赫赫有名，我对此并不陌生。不过，请原谅我的直言不讳——您的进取精神与对死亡的抗争非常值得敬佩，感觉就仿佛是命运的翅膀亲自将您送到了这艘船上一样。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}

languages.text: «Saludos, {name}. Naturalmente, la infamia de sus... logros en las sombras de un sector al completo no ha eludido mi atención. Su espíritu emprendedor y, si disculpa mi franqueza, completo rechazo a la muerte son cualidades dignas de elogio. Es como si las mismas alas del destino l{mf|e|a} hubieran conducido hasta aquí». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, {name}. Naturalmente, la infamia de sus... logros en las sombras de un sector al completo no ha eludido mi atención. Su espíritu emprendedor y, si disculpa mi franqueza, completo rechazo a la muerte son cualidades dignas de elogio. Es como si las mismas alas del destino l{mf|e|a} hubieran conducido hasta aquí». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、{name}さん。当然のことながら、セクター全体の影であなたの功績が…悪名を轟かせていることは私も知らないわけではありません。あなたの進取の気性と …飾らぬ物言いを許していただければ言いますと…死を拒む姿勢は称賛に値する資質と言えましょう。あなたは運命そのものの翼に乗ってここに運ばれてきたようなものだ」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします。{name}当然のことながら、セクター全体の影であなたの功績が…悪名を轟かせていることは私も知らないわけではありません。あなたの進取の気性と …飾らぬ物言いを許していただければ…死を拒む姿勢は称賛に値する資質と言えましょう。あなたは運命そのものの翼に乗ってここに運ばれてきたようなものだ」{n}ボイドヴィルは、かすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}

「よろしくお願いします、{name}さん。当然のことながら、セクター全体の影であなたの功績が…悪名を轟かせていることは私も知らないわけではありません。あなたの進取の気性と …飾らぬ物言いを許していただければ言いますと…死を拒む姿勢は称賛に値する資質と言えましょう。あなたは運命そのものの翼に乗ってここに運ばれてきたようなものだ」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}

languages.original_text: "My regards, . Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: « Mes hommages, {name}... Naturellement, la triste notoriété de vos... exploits dans les ombres de tout un secteur ne m'est pas inconnue. Votre audace et – pardonnez-moi ma franchise – votre refus de mourir sont des qualités qui méritent d'être saluées. On croirait presque que le destin lui-même vous a {mf|porté|portée} jusqu'ici sur ses ailes. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes hommages, {name}... Naturellement, la triste notoriété de vos... exploits dans les ombres de tout un secteur ne m'est pas inconnue. Votre audace et – pardonnez-moi ma franchise – votre refus de mourir sont des qualités qui méritent d'être saluées. On croirait presque que le destin lui-même vous a {mf|porté|portée} jusqu'ici sur ses ailes. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, {name}. Natürlich sind mir Eure berüchtigten ... Erfolge in den Schatten eines ganzen Sektors nicht unbekannt geblieben. Euer Geschäftssinn und Eure – verzeiht meine Offenheit – Verweigerung des Todes sind lobenswerte Qualitäten. Es ist, als hätten Euch die Flügel des Schicksals selbst hergetragen." {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me. Your enterprising spirit and — if you excuse my bluntness — refusal to die are qualities worth saluting. It is as if you were carried here on the wings of destiny itself." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, {name}. Natürlich sind mir Eure berüchtigten ... Erfolge in den Schatten eines ganzen Sektors nicht unbekannt geblieben. Euer Geschäftssinn und Eure – verzeiht meine Offenheit – Verweigerung des Todes sind lobenswerte Qualitäten. Es ist, als hätten Euch die Flügel des Schicksals selbst hergetragen." {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım {name}. Hâliyle, koca bir sektörün karanlık gölgelerindeki... Başarılarınızın ünü gözümden kaçmadı. Girişimci ruhunuz ve, dobralığımı bağışlayın, ölmeyi reddetmekteki ısrarınız şapka çıkarılacak nitelikte. Sanki kaderin kanatları sizi buraya getirmiş gibi." {n}Voigtvir, belli belirsiz gülümsüyor ama sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, {name}. Naturally, the infamy of your... achievements in the shadows of an entire sector is not unknown to me.
